com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class StyleChangeRecord

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.ShapeRecord
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.StyleChangeRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class StyleChangeRecord
extends ShapeRecord

Unlike StraightEdgeRecord and CurvedEdgeRecord, this shape record is used for changing the actual style rather than defining new shapes. There are three ways to do this:

  • select a previously defined fill or line style
  • move current drawing position to specified coordinates
  • replace current fill and line style arrays with new ones

See Also:

Constructor Detail

StyleChangeRecord

public StyleChangeRecord()
Creates a new StyleChangeRecord instance.

Method Detail

getFillStyle0

public int getFillStyle0()
Returns the value for fillStyle0 (i.e. the fill style for non-overlapping shape portions). This value is used as index in the current fill style array. A fill style value of 0 means the path is not filled. Check with hasFillStyle0() first if the style has been specified.

Returns:
the value for fillStyle0

getFillStyle1

public int getFillStyle1()
Returns the value for fillStyle1 (i.e. the fill style for overlapping shape portions). This value is used as index in the current fill style array. A fill style value of 0 means the path is not filled. Check with hasFillStyle1() first if the style has been specified.

Returns:
the value for fillStyle1

getLineStyle

public int getLineStyle()
Returns the value for the line style (i.e. the fill style for overlapping shapes). This value is used as index in the current line style array. A line style value of 0 means the path has no stroke. Check with hasLineStyle() first if the style has been specified.

Returns:
line style array index

getMoveToX

public int getMoveToX()
Returns the x coordinate of the current drawing position in twips (i.e. 1/20 px). Check with hasMoveTo() first if the value is set.

Returns:
x coordinate in twips

getMoveToY

public int getMoveToY()
Returns the y coordinate of the current drawing position in twips (i.e. 1/20 px). Check with hasMoveTo() first if the value is set.

Returns:
y coordinate in twips

getNewFillStyles

public FillStyleArray getNewFillStyles()
Returns the new set of fill styles which is supposed to replace the old one. Check with hasNewStyles() if new styles have been specified.

Returns:
new fill style array

getNewLineStyles

public LineStyleArray getNewLineStyles()
Returns the new set of line styles which is supposed to replace the old one. Check with hasNewStyles() if new styles have been specified.

Returns:
new line style array

hasFillStyle0

public boolean hasFillStyle0()
Checks if a value for fillStyle0 is selected. This value is used as index in the current fill style array.

Returns:
true if fillStyle0 specified, else false

hasFillStyle1

public boolean hasFillStyle1()
Checks if a value for fillStyle1 is selected. This value is used as index in the current fill style array.

Returns:
true if fillStyle1 specified, else false

hasLineStyle

public boolean hasLineStyle()
Checks if a value for the line style is selected. This value is used as index in the current line style array.

Returns:
true if line style specified, else false

hasMoveTo

public boolean hasMoveTo()
Checks if the style change record moves the current drawing position.

Returns:
true if new coordinates for the current drawing position were specified, else false

hasNewStyles

public boolean hasNewStyles()
Checks if the style change record specifies a new set of line and fill styles, thus replacing the old ones.

Returns:
true if line and fill style array specified

setFillStyle0

public void setFillStyle0(int fillStyle0)
Sets the value for fillStyle0 (i.e. the fill style for non-overlapping shape portions). This value is used as index in the current fill style array. Warning: style array indexes start with 1. A fill style value of 0 means the path is not filled.

Parameters:
fillStyle0 - fill style array index

setFillStyle1

public void setFillStyle1(int fillStyle1)
Sets the value for fillStyle1 (i.e. the fill style for overlapping shape portions). This value is used as index in the current fill style array. Warning: style array indexes start with 1. A fill style value of 0 means the path is not filled.

Parameters:
fillStyle1 - fill style array index

setLineStyle

public void setLineStyle(int lineStyle)
Sets the value for the line style (i.e. the fill style for overlapping shapes). This value is used as index in the current line style array. Warning: style array indexes start with 1. A line style value of 0 means the path has no stroke.

Parameters:
lineStyle - line style array index

setMoveTo

public void setMoveTo(int x,
                      int y)
Sets the current drawing position to new coordinates.

Parameters:
x - x coordinate in twips
y - y coordinate in twips

setNewStyles

public void setNewStyles(LineStyleArray lineStyles,
                         FillStyleArray fillStyles)
Specifies a new set of line and fill styles, thus replacing the old ones. This is not supported within the DefineShape tag.

Parameters:
lineStyles - a line style array
fillStyles - a fill style array
